extendedInfo.description: Run or get eaten! A speedy little bunny needs to escape the clutches of a terrifying Grizzly Bear in Bunny Run!Bunny Run is a FREE game with addictive and exhilarating arcade gameplay. Help the cute bunny as he runs, jumps, slides and whirls through the underbrush to outrun and outmaneuver the fearsome Grizzly Bear in this high-octane chase!Lost in foreign landsYou are a cute little bunny abandoned by a wandering carnival in a strange forest. Eyeing you suspiciously is a grizzly bear, and he's looking super hungry.  Suddenly the bear lunges at you - run, Bunny Run! Itâs a jungle out there but with enough speed you might be able to get away!Run for your life!Enjoy this exciting, fast-paced running game featuring an incredibly cute and cuddly bunny rabbit. Make the fluffy bunny run, jump, slide and glide to safety. Use your reflexes to control the bunnyâs movements and keep him out of the bearâs jaws. Are you up for the challenge? Find out in this action-packed runner!How to play:Tilt your device to steer Swipe up on your screen to jumpSwipe down on your screen to slide under obstaclesSwipe left or right to turn. Timing is important!Collect as many coins as you can â youâll need them for power-ups and new charactersFeatures:Visit 8 different forests on all 7 continentsUnlock and play more wild animals as charactersGear up with upgradeable equipment that will help you survive longerLots of different power-ups to unlock and upgrade as you playGive Bunny a head start! Purchase utility items for him to use in his escapePlay daily for a chance to win bonus itemsUnlock more missions to receive bonus rewards** Please note that while the app is free, please be aware that it contains paid content for real money that can be purchased upon users' wish to enhance their gaming experience. You can disable in-app purchases by adjusting your deviceâs settings. **

reviews.title: Lubs it!!!!
reviews.comment: From all the games I have downloaded this is my favorite its a fun,easy to learn and adventurous game....to cute and fun for all ages from my 6yr old,n my 14yr old to myself overall just a GREAT GAME!!!! :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: cute and nice...
reviews.comment: This is a cute and good game with a cute little sound...love this game!!!!
reviews.author: Francesca Erallah

reviews.title: Cutie Bunny Run
reviews.comment: Great game and it got alot of fun 2 play with.......but it is a slightly laggy when the bunny is runnin. Very entertaining goin around the world 2 a different places 2 go. So pls guys pls fix the laggy probs, thanxs.
reviews.author: Amanda Helen Heavenlybelleblue

reviews.title: Would recommend it
reviews.comment: Like this game & bunny is so cute, jst wish u got a couple of lives or that when u get the \"come back to life wher u die\" power up, that it gave u 1 in each new game not jst 1 full stop. Apart from that, it\'s good.
reviews.author: Emma Harrison

reviews.title: Awesome bunny is sooo cute !
reviews.comment: Amazing I luv it:)
reviews.author: Tana Tone

reviews.title: Its not my screens falt
reviews.comment: OK so this bunny just stops if I need to jump over something or slide under a branch it won\'t work and it is not my screens fault I dont recomand it one bit:-)
reviews.author: sarah Prosser

reviews.title: Not a good game!! :(
reviews.comment: I\'m very upset that every time I try to move to the left or right the bear grabs me & I die. How am I suppose to get all my coins if I can\'t move?? Cute game but I will be uninstalling
reviews.author: Chakinia Naves

reviews.title: Niczz.. bunny game
reviews.comment: It is the best games ever i had  in life. I really thax to the google play.
reviews.author: Chhoti Sharma

reviews.title: Not smooth enough!!
reviews.comment: I swipe it and it can\'t jump and also suddenly stop!! Please fix it as soon as possible!!! Actually it\'s a cute game!!
reviews.author: Law Sin Yee

reviews.title: Pros n Cons
reviews.comment: Love the temple run like idea, the bunny is so cute, just yate how it lags!! I swipe the right direction but the game doesn\'t accept it due to lag! Please fix the problem.
reviews.author: Nicole Raschen

reviews.title: 5 stars
reviews.comment: I love running games& always looking for new ones that play well,this is very cute,plays well will not be uninstalling this.Good work ,keep the updates coming:)
reviews.author: Helena Wann

reviews.title: Poorly balanced
reviews.comment: Good temple run effort, but sluggish occasionally for no reason, controls sometimes just don\'t register (especially turning) and obstacles you have to slide under completely block the screen making it almost impossible to play due to the short view distance. Gets frustrating fast.
reviews.author: Aaron Ramsay

reviews.title: Cute, addictive & fun.
reviews.comment: I love this game, its great fun and it is worth installing!
reviews.author: Isobel Newell

reviews.title: Same as temple run :D
reviews.comment: But its song too, good job, thr creator. P.S: can you improve the performance? Because at the ice place thr make my phone lag. Only 49.9% can reach the next level.
reviews.author: chong kah loong

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: Better than temple run. It is adorable! I find it unresponsive at times though.
reviews.author: Temoshi Takamishi

reviews.title: O.k.
reviews.comment: Would great if it was available offline. My daughter loves it and we don\'t have a connection most of the time.
reviews.author: Fred Charles

reviews.title: Galaxy note 10.1
reviews.comment: Simple n i like it...awesome apps
reviews.author: Asyraf Firdad

reviews.comment: Yhis game us addicting but i dont like when u die u cant spend ur money to recover luke on panda run but do download this game it is soo fun lol\tI complaint

reviews.title: Awesome game but lags
reviews.comment: I juz love this game but  u guyz should fix the lag prob when th bunny runs other than that awesome game
